metadata.title: CVE-2021-40540 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: ulfius_uri_logger in Ulfius HTTP Framework before 2.7.4 omits con_infoinitialization and a con_info->request NULL check for certain malformedHTTP requests.

criterions.comment: ulfius: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
